query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

result.title: Report on lessons learned for frameworks and concepts of multiple benefits
result.description: Lessons from the implementation of the MBenefits concept will be documented so that practitioners outside the project can learn from it We will highlight areas for improvement both in theoretical understanding of energyefficiency investment decisions and in design of energyefficiency policy programmes and projects for organisations
